DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effective treatment patient underwent Roux-en-Y gastric bypass develop postoperatively vitamin B12 deficiency .
DOC.detailed_description: Vitamin B12 deficiency account 23-64 % bariatric surgery . The investigator purpose evaluate effective treatment vitamin B12 deficiency patient underwent Roux-en-Y gastric bypass . Daily oral use vitamin B12 tablet may effective vitamin B12 injection .
DOC.criteria: Vitamin B12 deficiency : < 200 pmol/l Vitamin B12 deficiency 612 month surgery All patient underwent RouxenY gastric bypass 1 . Creatin > 150micromol/L 2 . Liver enzymes > 2 time upper limit 3 . Other bariatric operation 4 . Intercurrent diseases 5 . Gastrointestinal disease 6 . Psychiatric disease 7 . Medicines influence bone density 8 . Pregnancy
